pr_title: Use the correct OperationIdGenerator for OperationOutput

timeline.message:
Use the correct OperationIdGenerator for OperationOutput

Since only used in single place, move sha256 implementation and make it private

timeline.bodyText:
Should we have a name like Sha256-1.0?
I feel like 1.0 is really generic and another algoritm should not really have the same version.
timeline.author: tasomaniac

replies.bodyText: +1. We should definitely encourage unique version names.
replies.author: martinbonnin

replies.bodyText: Just pushed a commit. Plz have a look.
replies.author: tasomaniac

timeline.author: tasomaniac
